entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, November 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, November 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 8 new Photos were uploaded to 7 Pūjas as follows (1 high resolutions, 5 medium resolutions, and 2 low resolutions).
(i) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 2 low resolutions uploaded, link India 1913.
(ii) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(iii) 1913-0000 Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1913.
(iv) 1983-0211 Śhivarātri Pūjā: 1 resolution uploaded, link .
(v) 1987-0830 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1987.
(vi) 1988-1211 Śhrī Ādi Śhakti Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link .
(vii) 1990-1021 Diwālī Pūjā: 1 medium resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1990.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 9: Early Photographs (before 1976), Part 37
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1920-0000 Event K, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution and 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1920.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
